grammar.nonTerminals: N, L, T, M, F, Z
grammar.terminals: last, head, access, minimum, maximum, sum, count, take, drop, sort, reverse, filter, map, zipWith, scanl1, geq, leq, eq, neq, modeq, modneq, mul, div, plus, minus, pow, min, max

production.rule: L --> list(x), [1'2'3], take L M, drop L M, sort L, reverse L, filter L T M, map L F M, zipWith L L Z, scanL1 L Z
